import { useState } from "react" const AddTask = ({onAdd}) => { const [text, setText] = useState('') const [day, setDay] = useState('') const [reminder, setReminder] = useState(true) const onSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault() } return (
setText(e.target.value)}/>
setDay(e.target.value)}/>
setReminder(e.currentTarget.checked)}/>
) } export default AddTask
